department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Science and Parliamentary Infrastructure Branch (SPIB) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) seeks to retain the services of an engineering entity to support the development of Block 2, the Project. The scope of work includes detailed environmental, geotechnical, and industrial hygiene analysis, investigations, review and validation, detailed schematic design, design development, design packages, site services, and post-construction services.
full_summary:
================================

**Block 2 Environmental Consulting Services**

**Reference Number:** WS3699265876-Doc3699562610

**Solicitation Number:** WS3699265876

**Publication Date:** February 27, 2023

** Tender Closing Date:** May 15, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST

**Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** May 1, 2024

**Amendment Number:** 5

**Amendment Date:** May 8, 2023

**Contracting Entity:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
 Phone: none
 Fax: none
 Email: [stacey.aunger@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stacey.aunger@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Tender Description:**
The Science and Parliamentary Infrastructure Branch of Public Works and Government Services Canada intends to retain the services of an engineering entity, the Consultant, to support the development of Block 2, the Project. The scope of the Consultant’s services includes:

- Detailed analysis of Project requirements, including environmental, geotechnical, and industrial hygiene aspects
- Investigations and reviews as justified
- Review and validation of Project implementation sequencing
- Detailed Design Development and obtaining necessary approvals
- Site Services administration and on-Site oversight of the construction work
- Post-Construction Services

**Important:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 15, 2023 at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14307093?extsite=MTQzMDcwOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Supporting Documents:** None attached.
